_comment: United Kingdom compliance norms and standards database. Includes UKCA, BS standards, OFCOM, MHRA and other UK regulatory requirements post-Brexit. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: UK Conformity Assessed Marking
norms.applies_to: Products covered by UK Product Safety and Metrology legislation for Great Britain market
norms.description: Mandatory conformity marking for Great Britain (England, Wales, Scotland). Replaces CE mark for GB market. Covers similar product categories as CE. Self-declaration with technical documentation. Transitional arrangements ended for most products.

norms.name: UK Conformity Assessed Northern Ireland Mark
norms.applies_to: Products placed on Northern Ireland market
norms.description: Conformity mark for qualifying Northern Ireland goods. Used alongside CE mark for products covered by Northern Ireland Protocol. Applies to goods placed on NI market.

norms.name: UK LVD - Low Voltage Directive Implementation
norms.description: UK implementation of LVD. Essential safety requirements for electrical equipment. UKCA marking required for GB. Harmonized standards for presumption of conformity.

norms.name: UK EMC - EMC Directive Implementation
norms.applies_to: Equipment capable of generating or being affected by electromagnetic disturbance
norms.description: UK implementation of EMC Directive. Emission and immunity requirements. UKCA marking required for GB. Harmonized standards available.

norms.name: UK RED - Radio Equipment Directive Implementation
norms.description: UK implementation of RED. Essential requirements for radio equipment: safety, EMC, efficient spectrum use. UKCA marking required for GB. OFCOM notification for some devices.

norms.id: Restriction of the Use of Certain Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Equipment Regulations 2012
norms.name: UK RoHS
norms.description: UK implementation of RoHS Directive. Restricts lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, PBBs, PBDEs, phthalates. UKCA marking. Technical documentation required.

norms.id: Waste Electrical and Electronic Equipment Regulations 2013
norms.name: UK WEEE
norms.description: UK WEEE regulations. Producer responsibility for collection and recycling. Registration required. Crossed-out wheeled bin symbol. Collection targets and reporting.

norms.name: Audio/Video, ICT and Communication Technology Equipment - Safety
norms.description: UK adoption of IEC 62368-1. Hazard-based safety standard. Designated standard for UK Electrical Equipment (Safety) Regulations. Replaces BS EN 60950-1.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Safety (LEGACY)
norms.description: LEGACY standard for IT equipment. Withdrawn December 2020, replaced by BS EN 62368-1. May still be valid for existing certifications during transition.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - General Requirements
norms.description: General safety requirements for household appliances. UK adoption of IEC 60335-1. Designated standard. Part 1 of comprehensive series.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - Particular Requirements
norms.description: Part 2 series with specific requirements for different appliances. Multiple parts covering specific products. UK adoption of IEC standards.

norms.name: Secondary Cells and Batteries - Portable Lithium Batteries
norms.description: Safety requirements for portable lithium batteries. UK adoption of IEC 62133-2. Used for UK compliance.

norms.name: Electromagnetic Compatibility Standards
norms.description: Comprehensive EMC standards series. Generic emission and immunity standards. Product-specific standards. UK adoption of IEC 61000 series. Used for EMC Regulations compliance.

norms.name: Multimedia Equipment - EMC - Emission Requirements
norms.description: EMC emission requirements for multimedia equipment. UK adoption of IEC/CISPR 32. Designated standard for EMC Regulations.

norms.name: Multimedia Equipment - EMC - Immunity Requirements
norms.description: EMC immunity requirements for multimedia equipment. UK adoption of IEC/CISPR 35. Works with BS EN 55032.

norms.name: Wideband Transmission Systems - 2.4GHz
norms.description: UK adoption of ETSI EN 300 328. Technical requirements for 2.4GHz equipment. Designated standard for Radio Equipment Regulations.

norms.name: 5GHz RLAN Equipment
norms.description: UK adoption of ETSI EN 301 893 (now EN 303 417). Requirements for 5GHz wireless LAN. DFS and TPC requirements.

norms.name: EMC for Radio Equipment
norms.description: EMC requirements specific to radio equipment. UK adoption of ETSI EN 301 489 series. Part 1 general, part 2 product-specific.

norms.name: Radio Equipment Interface Requirements
norms.description: OFCOM technical requirements for radio equipment. Frequency allocations, power limits, technical standards. Notification scheme for some equipment. Enforcement of Radio Equipment Regulations.

norms.name: Specific Absorption Rate Limits
norms.applies_to: Mobile phones and body-worn wireless devices
norms.description: SAR limit: 2.0 W/kg averaged over 10g of tissue. Assessment required for devices used within 20cm of body. Part of Radio Equipment Regulations compliance.

norms.name: UK Medical Devices Regulation
norms.description: UK medical device regulations. Transition from EU MDR to UK-specific regime. UKCA marking required. MHRA approval. Classification I-III, IIa, IIb. Approved Body involvement for higher classes.

norms.name: Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency - Device Registration
norms.description: Registration with MHRA required for medical devices. Manufacturers, authorized representatives must register. Annual fee. Device listing. UKCA marking.

norms.name: Medical Devices - Quality Management Systems
norms.description: Quality management system requirements. UK adoption of ISO 13485. Required for UK medical device compliance. UK Approved Body audit.

norms.name: Medical Devices - Risk Management
norms.description: Risk management requirements. UK adoption of ISO 14971. Required for MHRA compliance.

norms.id: Product Safety and Metrology etc. Regulations 2022
norms.name: General Product Safety Framework
norms.applies_to: Consumer products not covered by specific legislation
norms.description: General safety requirement for consumer products. Product safety obligations, reporting, recalls. Replaces previous GPS regulations post-Brexit.

norms.name: UK Toy Safety
norms.description: UK toy safety regulations. Essential safety requirements including mechanical, physical, flammability, chemical, electrical properties. UKCA marking. Based on EN 71 standards.

norms.name: Safety of Toys Standards
norms.description: Comprehensive toy safety standards. UK adoption of EN 71 series. Mechanical/physical properties, flammability, migration of elements. Designated standards for Toys (Safety) Regulations.

norms.name: UK PPE Regulation
norms.description: UK PPE requirements. Essential health and safety requirements. Risk categories I, II, III. UKCA marking. Type examination for higher risk categories.

norms.name: UK Machinery Safety
norms.description: UK machinery safety regulations. Essential health and safety requirements. UKCA marking. Technical file, risk assessment. Note: Being updated to align with EU Machinery Regulation.

norms.name: UK Ecodesign Requirements
norms.description: UK ecodesign framework. Product-specific regulations set requirements. Energy efficiency, resource efficiency. Post-Brexit UK-specific requirements.

norms.name: UK Energy Labelling
norms.description: UK energy labelling framework. A-G scale. Product-specific labeling requirements. Post-Brexit UK energy labels (rescaled from A+++ system). Supplier obligations.

norms.name: UK Energy Efficiency Label
norms.description: Mandatory energy label for covered products. A-G scale (rescaled post-Brexit). QR code linking to product database. Required for GB market. Similar to but separate from EU label.

norms.name: UK REACH
norms.description: UK chemical regulation post-Brexit. Based on EU REACH but UK-specific. Registration with HSE. SVHC restrictions. Downstream user obligations. Applies to GB market.

norms.id: Batteries and Accumulators (Placing on the Market) Regulations 2008
norms.name: UK Battery Regulations
norms.description: UK battery requirements. Labeling (crossed-out wheeled bin, capacity). Heavy metal restrictions. Producer registration and recycling obligations. Note: Being updated to align with EU Battery Regulation.

norms.name: UK GDPR and Data Protection
norms.description: UK data protection law. UK GDPR provisions plus additional UK requirements. Similar to EU GDPR but UK-specific. ICO enforcement. Applies to products/services processing personal data.

norms.name: UK General Data Protection Regulation
norms.description: UK version of GDPR post-Brexit. Data protection principles, lawful basis, data subject rights, security requirements, breach notification. Enforced by ICO. Similar to EU GDPR with UK adaptations.

norms.name: PECR - ePrivacy
norms.description: Electronic communications privacy. Cookie consent, marketing communications, network security. Applies to connected devices, websites, apps. ICO enforcement.

norms.name: National Cyber Security Centre - Security Guidance
norms.description: UK cybersecurity best practices. Code of Practice for Consumer IoT Security. Secure by Default principles. Not mandatory for most products but increasingly expected. Government procurement requirements.

norms.id: Code of Practice for Consumer IoT Security
norms.name: IoT Security Guidelines
norms.description: 13 guidelines for IoT security including default passwords, vulnerability disclosure, secure communication. Basis for Product Security and Telecommunications Infrastructure (PSTI) Act.

norms.id: Product Security and Telecommunications Infrastructure Act 2022
norms.name: PSTI Act - IoT Security Requirements
norms.description: Mandatory security requirements for consumer IoT. No default passwords, vulnerability disclosure policy, security update period transparency. Enforcement from 2024. Applies to products with network/internet connectivity.

norms.name: Consumer Protection and Rights
norms.description: Consumer rights framework. Goods must be of satisfactory quality, fit for purpose, as described. Digital content provisions. Remedies for faulty goods. Enforced by Trading Standards and CMA.

norms.name: Product Liability
norms.description: Product liability law. Strict liability for defective products causing damage. No-fault basis. Applies to manufacturers, importers. Important for product safety considerations.

norms.id: Consumer Protection from Unfair Trading Regulations 2008
norms.name: Unfair Commercial Practices
norms.description: Prohibits unfair commercial practices including misleading actions/omissions, aggressive practices. Applies to product claims, advertising, sales practices. Trading Standards enforcement.

norms.name: UK Packaging Requirements
norms.description: Essential requirements for packaging. Minimize volume/weight, reusability/recoverability, limits for heavy metals. Note: Extended Producer Responsibility being introduced.

norms.name: EPR for Packaging
norms.description: New EPR scheme for packaging. Full net cost recovery from producers. Registration, data reporting, fees. Phased introduction from 2024. Significant compliance burden.

norms.name: IET Wiring Regulations - UK Electrical Installation Code
norms.description: UK electrical installation requirements. Not directly for product compliance but affects installed equipment. 18th Edition current (2018+amendments). Referenced in Building Regulations.

norms.name: Building Standards for England and Wales
norms.description: Building standards including electrical safety (Part P), fire safety, energy efficiency. Affects electrical equipment, building materials, fixtures. Similar regulations in Scotland, Northern Ireland.

norms.name: UK CPR - Construction Products
norms.description: Requirements for construction products. UKCA marking for GB (CE for NI). Performance declaration. Harmonized standards. Post-Brexit UK-specific regime.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems
norms.description: UK adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system requirements. UKAS accredits certification bodies in UK. Widely recognized globally.

norms.name: Environmental Management Systems
norms.description: UK adoption of ISO 14001. Environmental management system requirements. UKAS accreditation for certification bodies.

norms.name: Information Security Management Systems
norms.description: UK adoption of ISO/IEC 27001. Information security management requirements. Important for technology products and services. UKAS accreditation.

norms.id: Health and Safety at Work etc. Act 1974
norms.name: Workplace Health and Safety Framework
norms.description: Framework for workplace health and safety. Duty of care for employers, equipment suppliers. Affects design of workplace equipment. HSE enforcement.

norms.name: Provision and Use of Work Equipment Regulations
norms.description: Requirements for work equipment safety. Suitable for use, maintained, inspected. Affects industrial equipment, tools, machinery. HSE enforcement.

norms.name: Trademark Protection
norms.description: Trademark protection and registration. Prevents unauthorized use of protected marks. Administered by UK IPO. Criminal and civil enforcement.

norms.name: BSI Kitemark Certification
norms.description: Voluntary BSI quality and safety certification mark. Demonstrates compliance beyond regulatory minimum. Recognized mark of quality. Regular audit and testing. Various schemes available.

norms.name: CE and UKCA Marking Arrangements
norms.applies_to: Products for UK and EU markets
norms.description: Post-Brexit marking arrangements. UKCA for GB market, CE (with UKNI where applicable) for NI market. CE acceptance in GB ended for most products. Dual marking strategies needed for UK and EU.
